3D08DF31.0_instruction: Waypoints allow you to fast travel freely across Sanctuary. Activate waypoints as you explore to expand your waypoint options.

8C67E8B2.1_instruction: You can {c_highlight}earn Renown by completing various activities{/c} across the continent.

DBC6F233.2_instruction: Obtaining Renown will grant rewards and certain thresholds. View the status of your Renown for each region from the Map {hotkey:Map}
